title: Sans serif font
content:
Hello,  
Could you please help me identify the font in this logo please?  
thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo%20Small_4040.jpg)
author: thorkun

comments.content: Yup, this is Trajan. But it's a serif font, not a sans serif. =)
